languages.text: Служительница Неумирающего Императора Кибелла не простила Вольному Торговцу измены Человечеству. Они сошлись в битве, и твердой рукой Кибелла нанесла неотвратимый, смертельный удар... Лишь чтобы узнать, что ошибалась. Неумирающий — не есть смерть. {name} фон Валанциус есть смерть.

A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.
languages.original_text: Служительница Неумирающего Императора Кибелла не простила Вольному Торговцу измены Человечеству. Они сошлись в битве, и твердой рукой Кибелла нанесла неотвратимый, смертельный удар... Лишь чтобы узнать, что ошибалась. Неумирающий — не есть смерть. {name} фон Валанциус есть смерть.

traits.locale_text: A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's unflinching hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise she'd been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

They met in battle, and Kibellah's unflinching hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise she'd been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

languages.text: Als treue Dienerin des Todlosen Imperators konnte Kibellah {mf|dem Freihändler seinen|der Freihändlerin ihren} Verrat an der Menschheit nicht verzeihen. Es kam zum Kampf und Kibellahs sichere Hand holte zu einem tödlichen Hieb aus ... Erst dann erkannte sie, dass sie sich geirrt hatte. Nicht der Todlose war der Tod selbst, sondern {name} von Valancius.
languages.original_text: A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

traits.locale_text: Als treue Dienerin des Todlosen Imperators konnte Kibellah {mf|dem Freihändler seinen|der Freihändlerin ihren} Verrat an der Menschheit nicht verzeihen. Es kam zum Kampf und Kibellahs sichere Hand holte zu einem tödlichen Hieb aus ... Erst dann erkannte sie, dass sie sich geirrt hatte. Nicht der Todlose war der Tod selbst, sondern {name} von Valancius.

languages.text: En tant que fidèle servante de l'Empereur immortel, Kibellah ne pardonna jamais {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'avoir trahi l'humanité. {mf|Ils|Elles} s'affrontèrent en combat, et de sa main experte, la tisseuse lui asséna un coup de grâce imparable... avant de s'apercevoir qu'elle s'était trompée. L'Immortel n'était pas l'incarnation de la mort. En réalité, c'était {name} von Valancius.
languages.original_text: A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

traits.locale_text: En tant que fidèle servante de l'Empereur immortel, Kibellah ne pardonna jamais {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'avoir trahi l'humanité. {mf|Ils|Elles} s'affrontèrent en combat, et de sa main experte, la tisseuse lui asséna un coup de grâce imparable... avant de s'apercevoir qu'elle s'était trompée. L'Immortel n'était pas l'incarnation de la mort. En réalité, c'était {name} von Valancius.

languages.text: Kibellah, fiel sirvienta del Emperador Inmortal, no perdonó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente su traición a la Humanidad. Se enfrentaron en combate y la mano de Kibellah asestó un golpe letal e ineludible... momento en el que se dio cuenta de su error. El Inmortal no era la propia muerte. La muerte era {name} von Valancius.
languages.original_text: A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah, fiel sirvienta del Emperador Inmortal, no perdonó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente su traición a la Humanidad. Se enfrentaron en combate y la mano de Kibellah asestó un golpe letal e ineludible... momento en el que se dio cuenta de su error. El Inmortal no era la propia muerte. La muerte era {name} von Valancius.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝の忠実なる従者であったキベラは、人類を裏切ったローグトレーダーを許さなかった。二人は戦いの中で出会い、キベラの変わらぬ手腕が裂けようのない致命傷を与え…ようやく彼女は自分が思い違いをしていたことに気づかされた。不死の者とは死そのものではない。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスこそがそうだったのだ。
languages.original_text: A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝の忠実なる従者であったキベラは、人類を裏切ったローグトレーダーを許さなかった。二人は戦いの中で出会い、キベラの変わらぬ手腕が裂けようのない致命傷を与え…ようやく彼女は自分が思い違いをしていたことに気づかされた。不死の者とは死そのものではない。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスこそがそうだったのだ。

languages.text: 身为不死之神的忠仆，绮贝菈没有原谅行商浪人背叛人类的恶行。两人在战斗中相遇，绮贝菈以稳健的身手，对行商浪人打出了避无可避的致命一击……直到那个时候，她才意识到她一直都错了。不死之神并不是死亡本身，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯才是。
languages.original_text: A loyal servant of the Undying Emperor, Kibellah did not forgive the Rogue Trader for {mf|his|her} betrayal of Humanity. They met in battle, and Kibellah's steady hand dealt an inescapable mortal blow... Only for her to realise that she had been mistaken. The Undying One was not death itself. {name} von Valancius was.

traits.locale_text: 身为不死之神的忠仆，绮贝菈没有原谅行商浪人背叛人类的恶行。两人在战斗中相遇，绮贝菈以稳健的身手，对行商浪人打出了避无可避的致命一击……直到那个时候，她才意识到她一直都错了。不死之神并不是死亡本身，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯才是。
